title: Ubisoft bringing Rainbow Six to iPhone and iPad after three years of development, player tests coming soon
content:
The world of Rainbow Six is now coming to iPhone and iPad. Today, Ubisoft has announced that it is working on a new title, Rainbow Six Mobile. 

Rainbow Six is a popular first-person shooter on PC and console. Inspired by Rainbow Six Siege, gamers can play this “competitive, tactical, and immersive FPS experience” from anywhere.

more…

The post Ubisoft bringing Rainbow Six to iPhone and iPad after three years of development, player tests coming soon appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The world of Rainbow Six is now coming to iOS. Today, Ubisoft has announced that it is working on a new title, Rainbow Six Mobile.
